import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import Header from '../Common/Header'; export default function Restaurent() { let [restaurentdata, setRestaurentdata] = useState([]); const [search, setSearch] = useState('') search.toLowerCase(); let getproducts = () => { axios.get('http://localhost:5100/restaurent') .then((res) => { return res.data }) .then((finalres) => { setRestaurentdata(finalres.data) }) } useEffect(() => { getproducts(); }, []) return ( <>
{/*
Home
  • Jodhpur
    • Use your current location
    • { setSearch(event.target.value) }} aria-label="Search" />
*/} {/*
*/}

Top Restaurents in Jodhpur

{ restaurentdata.length >= 1 ? restaurentdata.filter((ritems) => { return search.toLowerCase() === '' ? ritems : ritems.name.toLowerCase().startsWith(search.toLowerCase()); }).map((ritems, index) => { return }) : 'No Data Found' }
) } function Restaurents({ rdata }) { return (
{rdata.name + 'Restaurent'} {rdata.rating}
{rdata.dish} {rdata.price}
{rdata.location} {rdata.distance}
) }
